lender.name: Natalie

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: Wide Gaming widens your knowledge and experience in the most popular card game of all time: poker. Poker has been a very popular card game since the 19th century, and it has continued branching out to many different variants in the years since it first broke the surface of the gaming and the gambling world. We at Wide Gaming bring you this widely-patronized game and try to break down its elements as well as present the different variants so that you can choose among the many games that have branched out since the standard straight poker first appeared on the tables as a legitimate card game. Come to our site and discover all things poker.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part in making a difference.

lender.name: Anthony | eikon events

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe in saving the world a dollar (or 25) at a time.

lender.name: Vince
lender.occupational_info: If you are interested in all things poker, then you have most definitely come to the right place. Pokermen takes your poker knowledge to a whole new different level by giving you background on the different poker game variants played in the casinos and at home, and then giving you a step-by-step guide on how to play the game so that you have the basic knowledge you will need to start your poker playing experience. Suggestions and tips are also given so that you can build on that knowledge you already have and play better games to win better hands.

lender.occupational_info: I am a full time college student. I work full time as well to pay for my college. I currently work at an insurance office (Farmer's to be exact). I will graduate in May 2010.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it changes the lives of great people.
lender.occupational_info: I currently stay at home with my two children.... I love watching them grow and learn!

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I find someone who I somehow relate to and who I feel I can help by loaning.
lender.occupational_info: I study textile art and design.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: A loan can bring opportunity and hope -- and everyone should have hope.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves creative opportunities
lender.occupational_info: I work at a plant nursery. I make new plants from seed and cuttings and sell my plants to nurseries which will be planted in gardens.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: We are all part of an interdependent global community.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their health.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have everything I need and am grateful for this. I'm aware every day that there are people struggling to feed, clothe and educate themselves and their children. I feel it is my duty.

lender.name: Bob Kramer
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have been blessed with a strong business and I now have an opportunity to give back and help others make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Custom Kitchen Knives

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: I have seen a presentation at a Willow Creek Christian Leadership conference in UK and would like to help in my own small way.
lender.occupational_info: University Lecturer - finance/accounting specialist

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do it.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I can. I can choose who to lend to, how much to lend and when it's repaid, I can lend it again. What a satisfying way to invest in people!

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I cant ignore God's call to show his love to mankind.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer systems for the police.

lender.name: StigErik
lender.loan_because: because j need it so bad. and it is for be able to inwest,and to be able to find my disappeared mother. And a new life will be forfilled.j work as a papermill. J lived alone, with no children, or famely. all j need is 3-4000,- And really, j think j came away from my biologic mother and family in The Hellas, Where j was kidnapped, into yhe land for, norway.
